name: Tick Tack Roll
description:
Tick Tack Roll is a re-adaptation of the popular Tic Tac Toe game.

This variant of the game uses RPG dice (d4 to d20) instead of simple crosses and circles. You can try to conquer a square taken by your opponent by rolling a die and bringing out a number equal to or greater than his.

The game is only a bare-bone prototype and was completed in just 8 hours due to my other commitments. Right now the game can only be played in split screen with another player and also lacks a lot of polish and interactability.
I'm commited to build the project once again from the ground-up after the GMTK 2022 game jam. I would also like to add a story mode. It will be short but cryptic and creepy.

To play it is required a mouse.
